content.prompt: Which of the following political debates in the twentieth century best explains the goal of the act to “fulfill the intent of the framers of the Constitution”?

choices.label: The debate over restricting civil liberties in wartime
The debate over the expansion of executive authority
The debate over the extension of individual rights to new groups
The debate over the role of the federal government in the economy

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
